1_2.text: Hey! It's a pleasure. Saw that epic shot you took, um...mind-blowing, eh?
Yo, thanks! Thought it was just a'ight, but it blew up. Yours ain't shabby either!
Really? I just...well, I guess the angle was good. Your lighting, was...stellar!
Stellar? Ha! Yours had me jealous. Catch ya later, gotta snap more pics!
